methods.title: Web Player for the current episode
Post publication date
methods.description: Uses WordPress datetime format by default or custom format: `{{ episode.publicationDate.format('Y-m-d') }}`

methods.title: Post recording date
methods.description: Uses WordPress datetime format by default or custom format: `{{ episode.recordingDate.format('Y-m-d') }}`

methods.title: Duration Object
methods.description:
Use `duration` to display formatted hours, minutes and seconds.
Alternatively, use the duration accessors for custom rendering.

methods.title: Image
methods.description:
- fallback: `true` or `false`. Should the podcast image be used if no episode image is available? Default: `false`

Example:

```jinja
{{ episode.image({fallback: true}).url }}
```

methods.title: Access a list of meta values
Access a list of post tags.
methods.description: See http://codex.wordpress.org/Function_Reference/wp_get_object_terms#Argument_Options for a list of available argument options. Example: ```html {% for tag in episode.tags({order: "ASC", orderby: "count"}) %} {{ tag.name }} ({{ tag.count }}) {% endfor %} ```

methods.title: Access a list of episode categories.
methods.description: See http://codex.wordpress.org/Function_Reference/wp_get_object_terms#Argument_Options for a list of available argument options. Requires the "Categories" module. Example: ```html {% for category in episode.categories({order: "ASC", orderby: "count"}) %} {{ category.name }} ({{ category.count }}) {% endfor %} ```

methods.title: License
methods.description:
To render an HTML license, use `{% include '@core/license.twig' %}` for
a license with fallback to the podcast license or 
`{% include '@core/license.twig' with {'license': episode.license} %}`
for the episode license only.

methods.title: List of episode contributors
